    public execSync(cmd: String, options: Object): String source 

    import {execSync} from 'skypager-util/src/index.js'

    Run nodes child_promise exec synchronously and capture the output, trimming any newlines or leading spaces

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    cmd String

    The command string, exactly the same as child_process.execSync
    options Object

    = {} Any arguments for execSync will work here

    Return:

    String

    Returns the command output

    public hideGetter(target: Object, name: String, fn: Function, options: Object): Object source 

    import {hideGetter} from 'skypager-util/src/index.js'

    Create a hidden getter property on the object.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    target Object

    The target object to define the hidden getter
    name String

    The name of the property
    fn Function

    A function to call to return the desired value
    options Object

    = {} Additional options
    options.scope Object

    The scope / binding for the function will be called in, defaults to target
    options.args Array

    arguments that will be passed to the function

    Return:

    Object

    Returns the target object

    public hideProperties(target: Object, properties: Object): Object source 

    import {hideProperties} from 'skypager-util/src/index.js'

    Create a bunch of hidden or non-enumerable properties on an object. Equivalent to calling Object.defineProperty with enumerable set to false.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    target Object

    The target object which will receive the properties
    properties Object

    = {} a key/value pair of

    Return:

    Object

    The target object

    public lazy(target: Object, attribute: String, fn: Function, enumerable: [type]): Object source 

    import {lazy} from 'skypager-util/src/index.js'

    Creates a lazy loading property on an object.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    target Object

    The target object to receive the lazy loader
    attribute String

    The property name
    fn Function

    The function that will be memoized
    enumerable [type]

    = false Whether to make the property enumerable when it is loaded

    Return:

    Object

    Returns the target object

    public promiseHash(obj: Object): Promise source 

    import {promiseHash} from 'skypager-util/src/index.js'

    Treats all values of an object as Promises and resolves them.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    obj Object

    The object which has the promises to be resolved

    Return:

    Promise

    A Promise which will resolve with the object values

    public propertyUtils(target: Object): Object source 

    import {propertyUtils} from 'skypager-util/src/index.js'

    Creates some functions that are useful when trying to decorate objects with hidden properties or getters, or lazy loading properties, etc. I use this a lot inside of constructor functions for singleton type objects.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    target Object

    This is the object you intend to be decorating

    Return:

    Object

    Returns an object with some wrapper functions around Object.defineProperty

    public query(nodeList: *[], params: *, negate: boolean): * source 

    import {query} from 'skypager-util/src/query.js'

    Query an array using a parameters hash which allows for different operators, and which can easily be serialized and sent over the wire

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    nodeList *[]
    • optional
    • default: []
    params *
    negate boolean
    • optional
    • default: false

    Return:

    *
